Mission.Name: Lost Island Mission 7
Mission.Description: Mission 7- Get the Lost Shores ready for the celebration

Mission.Name: Lost Island Mission 9

Mission.Name: Ancient01Zone01SP
Mission.Description: 10.200 entry: Greetings! My name is Dr. Brain and I have chosen you to be part of my secret society. The Secret Society of Dr. Brain is dedicated to exploration, adventure, and learning through time travel! You may even encounter a Goo Gord or two! However, you must first prove that you have the right stuff by completing all of these missions. Good luck time traveler!

Mission.Name: Ancient01Zone01Battle
Mission.Description: 10.100 entry: I have built a small time machine in my lab for testing, I call it the Time Slicer. So far, I have only tried to send inanimate objects through time. They end up as exploding globs of primordial ooze. Will continue experiments after cleaning up ...I am starting to smell.

Mission.Name: Ancient01Zone01Boss01
Mission.Description: 10.111 entry: The time slicer has been working with great success! Tomorrow I will try sending my goat Rudolph back in time. I have set up safety precautions to make sure nothing happens to her. She looks quite fearless in her flight helmet and goggles.

Mission.Name: Ancient01Zone02Collect
Mission.Description: 10.112 entry: Rudolph successfully time travelled today! Unfortunately she ended up in a tree...when I found her, she was happily grazing up there. She is home now, asleep on my bed. Time travelling gave her a bad case of goat gas! I will be sleeping in the Lab tonight.

Mission.Name: Anc01Zone02Boss01
Mission.Description: 10.116 entry: I am ready to time travel myself. So excited I can barely tpye. If Rudolph can do it, I certainly can!

Mission.Name: Anc01Zone03Nav01
Mission.Description: 10.120 entry: Just returned from a time trek back to the Ancient Era. Fascinating Egyptian hieroglyphics and statues! Saw a Gord...that means the Hench.... Will write more later…

Mission.Name: Anc01Zone03Boss01
Mission.Description: 10.127 entry: Success on another Time Trek! However, I just barely made it back...need to build a more powerful time machine -- The Super Time Slicer! The Hench's Henchmen and their Gords all over the universe. I must hurry…

Mission.Name: Anc01Zone04Boss01
Mission.Description: 10.133 entry: Yet another time trek! This time I was able to procure a blob of Globulus Utonium from the Hench! Although a bit gooey, it should power the Super Time Slicer for years to come.

Mission.Name: Anc01Zone05Boss01
Mission.Description: 10.150 entry: The Super Time Slicer is fully operational! If Henchs' spies find out about it, he will surely try to steal it! I know, I need to build a secret lab to keep it hidden! But Where? Where do you hide a time machine?

Mission.Name: Ind01Zone01SP
Mission.Description: 10.163 entry: In my last Time Trek I had an encounter with a Gord. Gords are robotic creatures invented by the Hench. He has sent out his Henchmen with armies of Gords, planting farms of Goopods everywhere they go!

Mission.Name: Ind01Zone01Boss01
Mission.Description: 10.172 entry: That Slobbering slugworm the Hench has infected time with his Goopods. I need help to stop him or else the universe will turn into a giant gelatinous glop of goo!

Mission.Name: Ind01Zone02Boss01
Mission.Description: 10.179 entry: Peter Piper Picked a Peck of Pickled Peppers. Goo Gords Grab Green Goo Globs of Globulus Goo. All work and no play, makes Dr. Brain a boring thinker, unable to tinker…

Mission.Name: Ind01Zone03Collect
Mission.Description:
10.189 entry:
!can you "think" you if things amazing do can You !muscles other your like just regularly out worked be to needs It .body your in muscle strongest the is It !brain your of power the underestimate Never--myself to Note

Mission.Name: Ind01Zone03Boss01
Mission.Description: 10.170 entry: Tired of fighting the Hench's Gord armies. No time to do my experiments and inventions, Need help...Jumpeez…

Mission.Name: Ind01Zone04Roller01
Mission.Description: 10.141 entry: Goats are intelligent and amazing creatures! They are great companions as far as Bovids go.

Mission.Name: Ind01Zone04Boss01
Mission.Description: 10.183 entry: I have scattered Holomorphic treasure chests throughout the worlds I've visited. They are linked to the Master Database so that I can change what treasures are inside and I know when they are activated. I hope the Jumpeez can find them and put them to good use!

Mission.Name: Ind01Zone05Nav01
Mission.Description: 10.167 entry: Ichthyoids or fish... come in so many colors, shapes, and sizes. And they breathe in water! I will build a home for these incredible creatures. I will create an underwater refuge where sea creatures of all types can frolic and thrive.

Mission.Name: Ind01Zone05Boss01
Mission.Description: 10.196 entry: I am wrtniig tihs in a knid of Cdoe. I beileve the Hench has cretaed a goo-lkie wlrod kwonn as Goolag. I do not konw wrehe it is so I can tmie treval trehe. I msut fnid it and sotp him berofe he teaks oevr the entrie unevirse wtih Goo!

Mission.Name: Check out your garage!
Mission.Description: Every racer needs a GARAGE. A place where you can mod your ride. Check it out!

Mission.Name: Make it through the Big Chomper!
Mission.Description: Feeling brave and reckless? Looking for speed and glory? I know exactly where to send you. Go check out the Big Chomper Race Track!

Mission.Name: Buy some new wheels for your ride.
Mission.DisplayName: Buy some new wheels for your ride.
Mission.Description: Are you ready to move ahead of the pack? Speed on over to the MECHANIC SHOP and cruise out with some new wheels.

Mission.Name: Buy a weapon for the front of your car.
Mission.DisplayName: Buy a weapon for the front of your car.
Mission.Description: Are you ready to DESTROY your competition?! We've got WEAPONS and lots of them at the ARMORY! Why don't you buy that massive one for the front of your car.

Mission.Name: Create a race.
Mission.Description: Be the BOSS! Create a Race in the RACING CIRCUIT and pick your favorite style and track.

Mission.Name: Kill 10 Zombies in the Combat Zone!
Mission.DisplayName: Kill 10 Zombies in the Combat Zone!
Mission.Description: Zombies are trying to take over the Combat Zone, go help out and kill 10 of them!
